quilt.computer

Class ImageRemnant

  • java.lang.Object
    • quilt.Remnant
      • quilt.MinRemnant
        • quilt.computer.ImageRemnant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    quilt.operation.Rotatable<quilt.Remnant>

    public class ImageRemnant
extends quilt.MinRemnant
implements quilt.operation.Rotatable<quilt.Remnant>
    ImageRemnant

    A Remnant that uses an image file as decoration.

    Source code is available.
